I tried this but i am getting error in " target_link_libraries(mpi_test ${MPI_LIBRARIES})" this line.

CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:413 (target_link_libraries):
Attempt to add link library "/usr/lib/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so" to target
"mpi_test" which is not built in this directory.

This is the error I am getting by adding those line.

body:
@songzenghui 
I tried this but i am getting error in " target_link_libraries(mpi_test ${MPI_LIBRARIES})" this line. 

CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:413 (target_link_libraries):
